Package com.StudentsBase.StudentsBase

Class SubjectController

java.lang.Object
com.StudentsBase.StudentsBase.SubjectController
@Controller @RequestMapping("/subjects") public class SubjectController extends Object
Controller handling requests related to Subjects.
Since:
JDK 17
Version:
1.0
Author:
Mariusz Gruszczynski, Mateusz Pysera

      id - the id of the subject to update
